Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that President Donald Trump invoked the 25th Amendment to remove Nancy Pelosi as House Speaker. This is not true and is an exaggeration of the facts.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the 25th Amendment does not govern issues regarding the removal and replacement of the Speaker of the House or other members of Congress.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a fictional article published by a known purveyor of junk news.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that President Trump and his attorney, Rudy Giuliani, are actively working to defend themselves against Democrats and the fake news press by invoking the 25th Amendment.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the claim, which is that it is a piece of satire mocking President Trump and his base of supporters.
